resources.string: A global pandemic COVID-19 has hit several countries globally, seriously affecting their GDP and human life.
Since 2020 has been a wild year, Here\'s your chance to give the rest of the year your twist…
A global pandemic COVID-19 has hit several countries heavily damaging life and livelihood. \nYou come up with an ingenious cure…
Doggos be made to rule the world.
Administer essential oils mixed with garlic.
You\'d think the other option will be it worked. It never works, Karen.
They decide to break every possible ceramic in hooman\'s house.
They form a committee to find a real cure.
Nice work! Here\'s your entire finished story, with some extra added bits. Take a look!
Meet Spot of the house Canine, First of his name, King of the hooman land, breaker of branches.
Lo Behold, the gods are pleased. Corona vanishes.
Be prepared to face an alien invasion next.
Even if they could, probably they\'ll break that vial containing the cure too, you know, out of habit.

A global pandemic COVID-19 has hit several countries heavily damaging life and livelihood. \nYou come up with an ingenious cure- %1$s . The people of the land wonder if you\'re okay in the head. Somehow (Don\'t ask me how), you convince them. Then, %2$s. Next %3$s.
